long_description: The Shimano Tiagra CS-HG50 9-speed cassette provides fast and responsive indexed shifting. Computer designed precision Hyperglide (HG) sprockets incorporate specifically positioned shift ramps and tooth profiles for improved chain control during shifting. Dependable Shimano performance for recreational road bikes. 12-25 tooth gear range. Compatible with Super Narrow HG-53 chain, sold separately.
short_description: The Shimano Tiagra CS-HG50 9-speed cassette provides fast and responsive indexed shifting.
